refnamediv.refpurpose: get option character from command line

refentry.refsection:
Description The .B sgetopt library is just like the .B getopt library, except that it prints errors using .B substdio rather than .BR stdio .
See .B getopt(3) for interface details.
.SH VERSION sgetopt version 1.9, 931201.
.SH "SEE ALSO" getopt(3), subgetopt(3), subfd(3), substdio(3)
